strapiPost.title: Bentonville's First Friday Is Pet-A-Palooza
strapiPost.content:
Bentonville's May First Friday theme is Pet-A-Palooza, a celebration of our furry friends on Friday, May 5, from 11a-9p on the Bentonville Square.

  • Bring in the pets: All things pet related, the event will have a petting zoo, a pet parade and adoption event, pony rides, the Bentonville Pets Talent Show, and more! Kids can even bring their favorite stuffed animals to get a check-up at the Best Friends' Stuffy Clinic.
  • Sing us a song: Come for lunch at 11a and join Yoga Story for a free class at noon. Heartland Dueling Pianos will take the mainstage at 7:30p, inviting song requests from the audience in this interactive rock out that you'll want to dance and sing along with!

Read more about what to expect at May First Friday HERE.
